코그 브론즈 등급 모자 (남성)
Cogs Bronze Rank Hat (Men)
齒輪黃銅等級帽(男用)
齒輪黃銅等級帽(男用)
Cogs Bronze Rank Hat
kDesc
Congratulations, you've attained Bronze Rank in Cogs! To commemorate this occasion, we hereby bestow upon you this stylish propellor hat. Wear it with pride! [#Legal]
Félicitations, vous avez atteint le rang Bronze de Cogs! Pour célébrer cela, nous vous offrons cet élégant chapeau à hélice. Portez-le avec fierté ! [#Legal]
Herzlichen Glückwunsch, du hast den Bronze-Rang von Cogs erreicht! Aus diesem Anlass verleihen wir dir hiermit diesen stilvollen Propeller-Hut. Trag ihn mit Stolz! [#Legal]
Congratulazioni, hai raggiunto il livello di Bronzo in Cogs! Per celebrare questo evento abbiamo deciso di conferirti questo elegante cappello con elica. Indossalo con orgoglio! [#Legal]
¡Enhorabuena, has alcanzado el nivel Bronce en Cogs! Para celebrarlo, te entregamos esta elegante gorra con hélice. ¡Llévala con orgullo! [#Legal]
*Not Localised* Male01_Hat_cogs_propeller [#Legal]
축하합니다, 코그에서 브론즈 등급을 획득했습니다! 당신의 실력을 기념하기 위하여 멋진 스타일의 모자를 리워드로 증정합니다. 자랑스럽게 입으세요! [#Legal]
Congratulations, you've attained Bronze Rank in Cogs! To commemorate this occasion, we hereby bestow upon you this stylish propellor hat. Wear it with pride! [#Legal]
恭喜您在「齒輪王」遊戲獲得黃銅等級！為了紀念這一刻，我們特別獻上這個時尚的螺旋槳帽子。戴上它以自豪吧！[#Legal]
恭喜您在「齒輪王」遊戲獲得黃銅等級！為了紀念這一刻，我們特別獻上這個時尚的螺旋槳帽子。戴上它以自豪吧！[#Legal]
Congratulations, you've attained Bronze Rank in Cogs! To commemorate this occasion, we hereby bestow upon you this stylish propellor hat. Wear it with pride! [#Legal]
